frontmatter.title: New Relic Joins AdoptOpenJDK Project To Strengthen Adoption of Java Technology
frontmatter.description: Today, we are excited to announce New Relicâ€™s partnership with the community-led AdoptOpenJDK project. This program provides free and open-source binaries of the Java runtime and core platform (typically referred to as the JDK) for production and development use worldwide.

frontmatter.title: Java Is Still Free and AdoptOpenJDK adds to your choices!
frontmatter.description: With the recent changes to Oracle JDK distribution and support there has been considerable uncertainty in the Java ecosystem. In particular there is confusion over the rights to use Oracle JDK vs Oracle's OpenJDK builds vs OpenJDK builds from other providers such as AdoptOpenJDK!
